donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: A significant improvement in the evaluation, research capacity of Participating UN Agencies and national development partners is expected. This will be achieved through the use of teachnically sound results frameworks, improved data collection and management, and increased evaluative capacity.

project_descr: 1.2.1 Support to One UN Monitoring and Evaluation Framework and development of the UN Knowledge Management agenda in Albania.
project_title: Support to One UN Monitoring and Evaluation
